prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (mysterious cosmic deity:1.2), small stature, (segmented violet and cyan skin:1.3), large void-like eyes, otherworldly presence, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: smooth bioluminescent skin texture, (realistic organic segmentation:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching high quality silk robes:1.3), cinematic volumetric lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human proportions, fleshy skin, nose, mouth, ears, muscular, low quality
